ai-thig3.4:1.3_0: I saw an elephant on the riverbank
ai-thig3.4:1.4_0: having just come up from his bath.
ai-thig3.4:2.1_0: A man, taking a pole with a hook,
ai-thig3.4:2.2_0: asked the elephant, “Give me your foot.”
ai-thig3.4:2.4_0: That man, walking along the streets,
ai-thig3.4:3.1_0: Seeing a wild beast so tamed,
ai-thig3.4:3.4_0: *that* is why I’ve gone to the forest!
